titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to issue guidance to States to improve care for infants with neonatal abstinence syndrome and their mothers and fathers or guardians under Medicaid.
Neonatal Abstinence Intervention Act
Neonatal Abstinence Intervention Act
Neonatal Abstinence Intervention Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
